title: Rules
context: [ยง147-125] Rules. The department shall have the necessary powers to carry out and effectuate the purposes of this part, and, subject to chapter 91, may adopt rules with respect to: (1) Standards for grades, genetic purity, identity, quality, and condition of seed; (2) Procedures for certifying seed; and (3) Other matters necessary to carry out the purposes of this part. [L 2003, c 49, pt of ยง1]
